data.title: George C. Scott
data.meta_description: Explore the filmography of George C. Scott on Rotten Tomatoes! Discover ratings, reviews, and more. Click for details!
data.text:
Highest Rated: 100% The Hospital (1971)

Lowest Rated: 14% Gloria (1999)

Birthday: Oct 18, 1927

Birthplace: Wise, Virginia, USA

A gruff, commanding lead, George C Scott has turned in impressive performances on stage, screen and TV since the 1950s, but is best remembered for his 1970 portrayal of "Patton."

Highest rated movies

100% The Hospital

100% Anatomy of a Murder 98% Dr. Strangelove Or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb

94% The Hustler

93% 12 Angry Men

91% Islands in the Stream

91% Patton

86% Petulia
